title: AI/ML at RVCE or CSE at PES
content:
Hello everyone. Our cet counseling began and option entry has started.
Should I prefer the newly introduce course(AI/ML) at RVCE over CSE at Pes? I asked a few seniors at RV and they said they don't have much info regarding the course as it's starting this year.
I also enquired with Pes seniors and it was a mixed response - 1) AI/ML would be very much in demand in the future+ RV tag
                   2) I'll be the first batch so we don't know how it is in RV. A safer bet would be CSE at Pes.

Im in a dilemma now. Any advice would be helpful guys! 
Thanks

comments.body:
I can get the above courses bro. 
I'm a lil hesitant to disclose my rank soz
Npp. Are u also taking part in counseling this year?
yeah I am too, hoping for ISE in MSRIT/BMS
Hey, so what did you get in mock? and what are choosing ai at RV or cs at pes?
